headline: Got $10,000? I Think DexCom Stock Could Be a Quiet Winner of the GLP‑1 Wars
summary: It's another reason to invest in this exciting medical device stock.

headline: Dexcom Announces Upcoming Conference Presentation
summary: SAN DIEGO, February 25, 2026--DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) today announced that management will present an update on the company at the 47th Annual Raymond James Institutional Investors Conference on Monday, March 2, 2026.

headline: BTIG Reiterates Buy on DexCom, Maintains $85 Price Target
summary: BTIG  analyst Marie Thibault   reiterates DexCom (NASDAQ:DXCM) with a Buy and maintains $85 price target.

headline: Mizuho Raises DexCom (DXCM) Price Target to $90 from $78 After Earnings Beat
summary: We recently published an article titled 13 Best Internet of Things (IoT) Stocks to Buy Now. On February 13, Mizuho analyst Anthony Petrone raised the price target on DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) to $90 from $78 while maintaining an Outperform rating, citing a favorable post-earnings setup following a quarterly beat that exceeded expectations. The previous day, […]
